title: God of Thunder and His Drum
text: Many Japanese painters of other schools were inspired by the playful images of O_tsu-e artists. Hokusai based this sketch on the O_tsu-e theme of the god of thunder frantically fishing for his thunder-making drum which he has accidentally dropped into the sea.
description: figure in URC holding a rope attached to a basket which is in the water below (in LLC)
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
